comment: Dr. Adams was a wonderful professor. She is knowledgeable of her content and is dedicated to her students. She also gives helpful feedback on the assignments, given that you submit on time. I would definitely take a class taught by her again!

Dr. Adams rarely responds to emails. Many in the class were confused by her directions. For example, she said in the syllabus that discussion posts are for a grade, but then in a Skype session she said to only do them if they help you (She did end up grading them in the end.) Get ready to email your classmates a ton for clarification.
Knows so much. Excellent. Helpful. Creative. Supportive. Makes research fun.

Dr. Adams is the most genuinely helpful professor i have ever had. She is enthusiastic and knowledgeable about teaching and has valuable lessons to share. She's also super funny and really pays attention to what students have to say. She makes the course easy to understand while also making the material relevant and timeless.
